summary: A long time ago, in a world far far away...
descriptionHtml:
[color=#38761d][size=4][b]My very first mod ^-^[/b][/size][/color]


Ever wanted to play as a Wookiee? Well sadly there isn't a mod for that yet but! With this game save you can get a feel for it!:D 

He is equipped with Ancient Nord Armor(excluding helmet),a Crossbow, expsolive fire bolts, and twin Nordic maces. 

He is level 43 with Stamina and Health as a focus, He's got perks in some trees but you can just legendary them to reset 'em.

DAWNGUARD AND DRAGONBORN IS REQUIRED!!! As he holds the Enhanced Dwarven Crossbow and explosive fire bolts along with twin Nordic Maces.

[quote][b][size=4]UPDATES?[/size][/b][/quote][list][*]1.1 added follower version that only requires the base game.[/*]
[/list]Going to add
[list][*]Proper Wookiee speak [/*]
[*]May alter skeleton for more wookiee look[/*]
[/list]
[quote][size=4]REQUIRED MODS[/size][/quote]
[list][*][b](Khajiit Mane)[/b] http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53120/?
[/*]
[*][b](Better Claws and Guantlets)[/b] http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52918/?  [i][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#0000ff] [/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000]I'd take the alternate stance file as well, it looks better than the vanilla stance.[/color][/font][/i][/*]
[*][b](Moonlight Tales)[/b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35470/?[/*]
[*][b](Tail Removal Kit)[/b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13933/?[/*]
[/list]
[size=4][quote][size=4]RECOMMENDED[/size][size=4] MODS[/size][/quote][/size][list][*][b](Darker Dwarven Crossbow)[/b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25312/?[/*]
[*][b](Oblivion  Falcon)[/b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50538/? [color=#ff0000]Just a fun mod to do as Chewie:D[/color][/*]
[/list]

There are some other mods in the save that aren't in the recomended and required mods, so don't be alarmed if it says files are missing.
author: anurfherder
